name: init
desc: Initializes an instance of a slider control.
declaration: virtual bool init(IOUserAudioDriver *in_driver, bool in_is_settable, uint32_t in_control_value, IOUserAudioSliderRange in_range, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElement in_control_element, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioObjectPropertyScope in_control_scope, AudioDriverKit::IOUserAudioClassID in_control_class_id);
